entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What are we doing with `IConnectionEndPointFeature` #43786
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.SourceGenerators can't find interface when building MAUI Hybrid app with generic component using the interface as type constraint #43782
  • Consider invalidating ComponentProperties cache when Hot Reload triggers metadata update #43780
  • Blazor inherited CssClass property is interpreted as an attribute #43779
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Cannot properly handle invalid url #43774
    7.0.0
  • HttpSysException(1299): Indicates a particular Security ID may not be assigned as the label of an object. #43773

Closed

  • Unskip UserSecret tests #25109
    8.0-alpha1
  • Components don't reset their received parameters during hot reload updates #31272
    7.0-rc2
  • Minimal api allows to describe response types #43708
  • Kestrel doesn't reject some invalid Transfer-Encoding headers #43664
    6.0.10
  • Endpoint routing failures are cached #43693
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes_ef, single_query #43769
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref needs to be produced and versioned correctly in servicing for source-build #39471
  • AspCore 6 SignalR Groups.AddToGroupAsync Bug #43767
  • Continue to support UseProxyToSpaDevelopmentServer #43702
  • NavigationLock with ConfirmExternalNavigations doesn't show confirm dialog when changing address bar after initial app load #43725
    7.0-rc2
  • Summary of FileStreamHttpResult.cs is incorrect. #43744
    Backlog
  • Support F# in blazor projects #43771
  • NullReferenceException when defining @page route with parameter #43763
  • Razor Conditional Css not being bundled in Maui RCL #43772
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] cannot start a connection on linux arm #43753

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix NavigationLock prerendering #43785
    area-blazor
  • Fix non-shared framework packages referencing transport package #43784
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43783
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add default error response to gRPC transcoding #43768
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2

Merged

  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `9080381` #43689
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.30
  • Update branding to 3.1.30 #43776
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.30
  • Update branding to 2.1.38 #43778
    2.1.x
  • [release/7.0]: Throw if a by ref type is returned to avoid making invalid IL #43733
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `9080381` #43690
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.10
  • [6.0] Handle Transfer-Encoding edge cases #43671
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.10
  • Pin language version in release branch #43628
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.10
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43576
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.10
  • [release/6.0] Remove Windows.10.Amd64.Server20H2.Open #43554
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.10
  • Update branding to 6.0.10 #43777
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Don't cache Endpoints if a source throws #43729
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, feature-routing, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Unskip tests now that Runtime bug is fixed #43667
    area-commandlinetools, 8.0-alpha1
  • Remove aspnetcore submodule workaround #43775
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43647
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `afd902e` to `0e0d9fe` #43762
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Fixed summary for FileStream property. #43764
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix auth exception stopping QUIC connection listener #43730
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Remove tagged keys as entries are evicted #43728
    area-runtime, ask-mode, feature-output-caching
  • Fix Typos #42612
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [6.0] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.10
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • Avoid client result invocation ID collisions #43716
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Fix redirect to login #43520
    area-mvc
  • [7.0-rc2] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704 #43706
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1985082 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix summary formatting #43711
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
